desc: Reduces BB gauge required for BB, considerably boosts BB gauge each turn, 15% boost to all parameters & negates all status ailments

dictionary.lore: A medical text stored in the Akras Summoners' Hall. The legacy of a famed doctor who saved countless lives during the dawn of the Elgaian Era, it lists treatment methods for many different illnesses. Since practicing these methods awakens latent powers in the practitioner, it is said that they will never experience the same illness twice. Its efficacy is demonstrated by its careful preservation even into the present day.

name: Health Codex
